Name: Bongo Quest
About the game: bongo quest - a bright colorful platformer for lovers of prehistoric adventures is waiting for you! Embark on an unforgettable journey through an ancient world inhabited by dangerous plants and aliens, hidden in the foliage of a primeval jungle. Make your way deeper and deeper into the ancient wilderness to complete your tribe's mission and obtain seeds for planting, or else your tribe will die of hunger! Watch out for sharp teeth, grasping plant branches and deep abysses with dangerous thorns. Peculiarities: - Nice graphics - Nice soundtrack by Tim Beek
